title: Hershie's Kiss
description: For blind Tolerance Director, Charlie Salinger, life has never been easy. Taught at an early age to appear 'normal', he moves through life one carefully placed step at a time. He's a hard man to get to know and an even harder man to love. Retired Marine, Jack Hershie has lived his life for the corp. Always doing what was expected of him, Jack endured a tortuous marriage in the name of proper conduct. Now, at the age of forty-three, Jack is ready to live his life by his own set of rules. See what happens when you put two strong Alpha males into the same house. Have a fire extinguisher handy because this is going to be a hot one! This book is best read in sequence as part of a series
author: Carol Lynne
